name: CUST_SERVICE_TRANSFER
description: The CUST_SERVICE_TRANSFER table contains information about patient transfer requests that have been documented in a customer service communication record. This can be used to report on communication documented by staff who facilitate calls between referring providers and admitting providers for potential transfer patients.

columns.name: COMM_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the customer service communication record.

columns.name: TRANS_PAT_SSN
columns.description: The social security number of the patient for whom the transfer is requested.

columns.name: TRANS_REF_PROV
columns.description: The name of the referring provider who is requesting the patient be transferred.

columns.name: TRANS_PAT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the patient for whom the transfer is requested.

columns.name: TRANS_PAT_AGE
columns.description: The age of the patient for whom the transfer is requested.

columns.name: TRANS_PAT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description: The category ID for the sex of the patient for whom the transfer is requested.

columns.name: TRANS_PAT_POINT_OF_ORIGIN_C_NAME
columns.description: The point of origin category ID for the source location from which the requested patient will be physically transferred.
entries: CEB Really Really Really Really Long Value

columns.name: TRANS_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The transfer reason category ID for the patient transfer request.

columns.name: TRANS_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: The level of care category ID for the patient transfer request.
entries: <marquee>Tried to type with monster claws from Godzilla costume on</marquee>

columns.name: TRANS_PAT_CLASS_C_NAME
columns.description: The patient class category ID for the patient transfer request.

columns.name: TRANS_ACCOMMODATION_CODE_C_NAME
columns.description: The accommodation code category ID for the patient transfer request.

columns.name: TRANS_ACCOMMODATION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The accommodation code reason category ID for the patient transfer request.

columns.name: TRANS_HOSPITAL_SERVICE_C_NAME
columns.description: The hospital service category ID for the patient transfer request.
entries: Boldly go where no service has gone before.

columns.name: TRANS_NEEDED_BY_DT
columns.description: The date the patient transfer is needed by.

columns.name: TRANS_CLIN_ACCEPTED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient transfer is clinically accepted or not.

columns.name: TRANS_CLIN_DECISION_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who recorded the clinical decision for the transfer request.

columns.name: TRANS_FIN_ACCEPTED_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the patient transfer is financially accepted or not.

columns.name: TRANS_FIN_DECISION_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who recorded the financial decision for the transfer request.

columns.name: TRANS_DECISION_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description: The decision reason category ID for the patient transfer, entered when the request is either accepted or denied.

columns.name: TRANS_REF_ORG_C_NAME
columns.description: The transfer referral organization category ID for the patient transfer request.

columns.name: TRANS_PAT_DOB_DT
columns.description: The date of birth of the patient for whom the transfer is requested.

columns.name: TRANS_CLIN_DECISION_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time when the clinical decision regarding the patient transfer request was recorded.

columns.name: TRANS_FIN_DECISION_DATETIME
columns.description: The date and time when the financial decision regarding the patient transfer request was recorded.

columns.name: REQUEST_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the current status of the Transfer Center request.

columns.name: DEST_DECLINE_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores why a considered destination was marked as declined for the request.

columns.name: CANCEL_STATUS_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the reason why a Transfer Center request was canceled.
entries: Patient condition not suitable for transfer

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the provider record documented as the referring provider for a transfer center request.

columns.name: REFERRING_LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location record documented as the referring location for a transfer center request.

columns.name: TRANSFER_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the type of transfer being requested.

columns.name: REFERRING_LOC_IS_OTHER_YN
columns.description: This column stores whether the referring location of this Transfer Center request is stored as a discrete record or as free text.

columns.name: FREETEXT_REFERRING_LOC_NAME
columns.description: The referring location of a Transfer Center request, stored as free text.

columns.name: REQUEST_IS_EMTALA_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether a patient transfer falls under EMTALA (Emergency Medical Treatment and Labor Act) legislation in the United States.

columns.name: TRANSFER_REGION_ID
columns.description: Region associated with the Transfer Center request.

columns.name: TRANSFER_REGION_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this cleaning sector.

columns.name: DEST_LOC_ID
columns.description: Location associated with this destination planning record for a Transfer Center request.

columns.name: MODE_OF_TXPORT_C_NAME
columns.description: Describes by what method a Transfer Center patient is being transported to the destination location.

columns.name: TXPORT_SERVICE_ID
columns.description: Which EMS/Transportation service will be in charge of moving a transferred patient from the referring location to the destination location.

columns.name: TXPORT_SERVICE_IS_OTHER_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether the transportation service provider has been stored as free text. If yes, then column FREETEXT_TXPORT_SERVICE_NAME will contain the free-text name.

columns.name: TXPORT_CONTACT_NUM
columns.description: The contact number for the transportation service provider moving the patient to the destination location.

columns.name: EXPECTED_ARRIVAL_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time the patient is expected to arrive at the destination location.

columns.name: TXPORT_DISPATCH_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the transportation service provider was dispatched to pick up the patient being transferred.

columns.name: TXPORT_PICK_UP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that the patient was picked up from the referring location.

columns.name: PAT_ARRIVAL_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: What time the patient arrived at the destination location.

columns.name: FREETEXT_TXPORT_SERVICE_NAME
columns.description: This item stores the free-text name of the transportation service provider associated with a Transfer Center request.

columns.name: SOURCE_ADMISSION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time of a request's source encounter. For manually entered encounters.  For linked hospital encounters, use PAT_ENC_HSP__INP_ADM_DATE, for the inpatient admission date/time, and/or PAT_ENC_HSP__HOSP_ADMSN_TIME, for the date and time that the patient was first admitted to the facility, bedded in the ED, or confirmed for an HOV for this contact, regardless of patient's base patient class.  For appointment encounters, use  PAT_ENC_APPT__CONTACT_DATE for the date and PAT_ENC_APPT__PROV_START_TIME for the time.

columns.name: SOURCE_ADMSN_LVL_OF_CARE_C_NAME
columns.description: The level of care of a request's source encounter. For manually entered encounters.  For linked hospital encounters, use PAT_ENC_HSP__LEVEL_OF_CARE_C instead.

columns.name: TRANS_BACK_TO_REFERRING_LOC_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether a source encounter location is willing to accept a transfer back. 'Y' indicates that they are. 'N' or NULL indicates that they are not.

columns.name: PAT_IS_IN_STATE_RESIDENT_YN
columns.description: Indicates whether or not the patient of a Transfer Center request is an in-state resident of the state of the target destination.

columns.name: TRANS_REFER_ZONE_C_NAME
columns.description: The geographical zone of the referring facility.

columns.name: TRANS_REQ_ZONE_C_NAME
columns.description: The geographical zone the referring facility asked to send the patient to.

columns.name: TRANS_DEST_ZONE_C_NAME
columns.description: The geographical zone of the selected destination.

columns.name: REQUESTED_DEST_LOC_ID
columns.description: Holds the record ID of the EAF record for the requested destination of the Transfer Center request.

columns.name: TC_PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description: The priority of a Transfer Center request.

columns.name: PRIN_ACC_PROV_CONTACT_IDENT
columns.description: This stores the line number of the Contact Log entry that is the principal accepting provider for the Transfer Center request.

columns.name: REFERRING_PROV_ADDR_ID
columns.description: This provides a link to the address of the referring provider. To obtain the address information, join to the table CLARITY_SER_ADDR on the ADDR_UNIQUE_ID column. If you use IntraConnect, you also need to join the REFERRING_PROV_ID column to CLARITY_SER_ADDR.PROV_ID.

columns.name: SOURCE_ENC_DEPT
columns.description: The department where a source encounter on a request occurred. For manually entered encounters.  For linked hospital encounters, use PAT_ENC_HSP__DEPARTMENT_ID. For linked appointment encounters, use PAT_ENC_APPT__DEPARTMENT_ID.

columns.name: SOURCE_ENC_ROOM_AND_BED
columns.description: The bed (and room, if applicable) that a patient was assigned to in a manually entered source encounter.  For linked hospital encounters, use  PAT_ENC_HSP__ROOM_ID and PAT_ENC_HSP__BED_ID instead.
